none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 09, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 CONVERSIONS have got to be one of the most under appreciated bands of the '00s. The song construction is erratic, the guitars are 'too' clean for a hardcore band and Terry's vocals are straight fire. They are just so fast, so all over the place, so in your face and so weird...but it's Strunk's drums that will make your face melt, dude is one of the wildest humans I've ever seen behind a kit. CONVERSIONS could have "just" been a hardcore bend if they had chosen to do so, and they would have been an incredible "just" hardcore band...but are a completely different animal. Both of the full length releases are screamers, and you can hear when they were after the instant the first demo (this one) starts.THE CONVERSIONS 
https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEhena8T0LB9GCwWrAhHe-LKEaqJquKRVzrSmql5mSWlqg19bVjNO53tTHhB4HdUgH4EOwymILADsVHyVTZfPvMSnyUlziae_ELAWBF6irmhM_TIFHXm5QoDgYF8Xgm1mxZwyYy13haUeMMGgfZPK0Q0X-XMgLq6NEGDiLG3LX5_VzSdluQMsKJLCql-xA/s762/Conversions%20outside.jpg
